a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Child mortality vs. level of prosperity, 2022
Countries below the grey line achieve better child health than predicted by their income. Countries above the
line achieve better health than predicted.
Data source: United Nations Inter-agency Group for Child Mortality Estimation (2024); Our World in Data; World Bank (2023)
